title: 6g, etc. bork on shebangs
body:
by **andrew.pennebaker**: 
I like adding #!/usr/bin/env gorun to my Go programs to for scripting, but 6g and
friends bork:

$ make
6g  -o _go_.6 hello.go
hello.go:1: syntax error: unexpected #
hello.go:1: package statement must be first
hello.go:1: syntax error: unexpected /
make: *** [_go_.6] Error 1

Please allow the Go compilers to ignore shebang lines.
